```{r, warning= FALSE}
library(psych)
library(pander)
library(xtable)
library(psy)

setwd("A:/Fall 2017/Stats 154/")
load("ICPSR_34871/DS0001/34871-0001-Data.rda")

df1 <- da34871.0001

df2 <- na.omit(df1[,2:19])
df3 <- as.data.frame(lapply(df2,as.integer))

#rekeying
#rekeying
rekey <- function(item){
  item[item == 1] <- 8L
  item[item == 2] <- 7L
  item[item == 3] <- 6L
  item[item == 4] <- 5L
  item <- item - 4L
  return(item)
}
df3$Q9 <- rekey(df3$Q9)
df3$Q10 <- rekey(df3$Q10)
df3$Q15 <- rekey(df3$Q15)

binary <- function(df){
  for(i in  1:18){
    df[,i][df[,i] < 3] <- 0L
    df[,i][df[,i] >= 3] <- 1L
  }
  return(df)
}


df4 <- binary(df3)


pca <- princomp(df3)
summary(pca)
plot(pca)

pca <-princomp(df4)
plot(pca)
pca

#polychoric correlation 
polychoric(df4)

#polyserial correlation 
polyserial(df4,df4)


plot(princomp(df3))


fa <- factanal(df3, 4, rotation = "varimax")
fa 
print(fa, cutoff = 0.1, sort = TRUE)

load <- fa$loadings[,1:2]
plot(load, type = "n")
text(load,labels=names(df3),cex=1)


ev <- eigen(cor(df3))
ev$values
kaiser(fa)
scree.plot(cor(df3))
```
